citations.narrative:
The site address provided by the registrant is for a mailbox. A registrant shall notify the deputy administrator by certified
mail of any changes in the name, address, ownership, or other change in operations affecting status as a carrier within 10
days after making such change. Provide Animal Care with a valid physical address where routine unannounced
inspections can take place.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

DEC-23.
End Section

narrative:
2.27(a)  Repeat
   
Notification of change of operation. 
The site address provided by the registrant is for a mailbox. A registrant shall notify the deputy administrator by certified 
mail of any changes in the name, address, ownership, or other change in operations affecting status as a carrier within 10 
days after making such change. Provide Animal Care with a valid physical address where routine unannounced 
inspections can take place. 
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15-2:45pm on 18-
DEC-23. 
 
 
End Section
